## Graphs

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
# wranngling
three_cities <- india_air %>%
  filter(city %in% c("Mumbai",
                     "Delhi",
                     "Chennai"))
```


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = three_cities, mapping = aes(x = date,
                                       y = PM2.5,
                                       color = city)) +
  geom_line(size = 1,
            alpha = 0.7) +
  xlim(mdy("1/1/2019"), mdy("1/1/2020")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        axis.title.x = element_blank()) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 610),
                     expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Accent") +
  labs(color = "City",
       title = "PM2.5 Levels in Chennai, Delhi, and Mumbai during 2019")
```
